A Progressive Web App (PWA) is a web app that uses modern web capabilities to deliver an app-like experience to users. ... You can deploy your app as a PWA as well as Native app and take advantage of both channels. Ionic allows you to ship your app to not only the app store, but also deploy to the mobile web as a PWA.
